response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, representing years of innovation and dedication. We are offering this exceptional piece to you at a special price of $850,000. This opportunity is exclusive and tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for quality. Don't miss out on this chance to own a masterpiece that could potentially grow in value over time. We look forward to hearing your thoughts and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits us both.", "product_price": 850000}
